data.title: Little League Baseball and Softball
data.meta_description: Founded in 1939, Little League Baseball and Softball is the world’s largest organized youth sports program, with millions of players and more than one million adult volunteers in every U.S. state and more than 80 other countries.
data.text: Johoku Little League (Tokyo, Japan) has been named the recipient of the 2024 Jack Losch Little League Baseball® World Series Team Sportsmanship Award based on their display of sportsmanship on and […]
